home.content: Hi, I'm Coleen Huang, a web developer based in the Sacramento Area.

about.title: About
about.content: I've always been someone who loves creating and trying new things. My fascination with programming began when I saw my dad write a program to solve his sudoku puzzles for him. It opened a new door for me, as it showed how programming as basically harnessing the power of the computer to make life easier. My desire to get better at programming grew when I started working at a lab. It was inefficient to use google sheets as a database for tracking thousands of mice. And also how painful and time consuming it was to manually count each data point on the photos of each sample. I felt that there must be a better way of doing this.

projectList.title: Ancient Greek Quiz App
projectList.description: Inspired my love of Classics and Ancient Greece, I created this app to test people on trivia about Ancient Greece.
